meanings.definition: Relating to the study of the effects of radiation on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The radiobiological research team conducted experiments on how radiation affects plants.
meanings.sent2: The radiobiological impact of the nuclear accident was evident in the mutated wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The radiobiological lab mice glowed in the dark after exposure to radiation.
meanings.sent4: Her radiobiological expertise shone brightly in the field of radiation biology.
meanings.sent5: The radiobiological effects of the sun's rays on the skin can be harmful if not protected.

meanings.definition: Involving the biological effects of radiation.
meanings.sent1: The radiobiological consequences of the nuclear disaster were devastating for the ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: Radiobiological studies have shown how radiation impacts cell growth.
meanings.sent3: The radiobiological experiment with the fruit flies resulted in unexpected mutations.
meanings.sent4: His radiobiological knowledge helped in understanding the impact of radiation on DNA.
meanings.sent5: The radiobiological changes in the fish population were a direct result of the radioactive spill.
